subject: Engagement of fee (toll) collecting agency for collection of fee (toll) on the bridges
text: 9Rr 7cft4 ~TH1f gffuas<ur PHONE 91-11-5074100/5074200 (T3$ wavv 37< <rothrf #AT4) Fax 91-11-5080360 / 5080460 Extn; 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Aoad Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, SECTOR-10_ DWAAKA NEW DELKI-110045 NHAI/ 12011/12/96-CM/ Vol II 9.10.02 All PIU/ CMUs NHAI Circular no: NHAI/ Commercial Operations/ 7 Sub: Engagement of fee (Toll) collecting agency for collection of fee (toll) on the bridges It has been decided that only Directorate General Resettlement (DGR) sponsored agencies will be engaged for   collection of toll on the bridges till the likely date   of substantial completion of the stretch in which the falls: You may send category wise requirement of manpower (booth operator; supervisor; cashier etc) for each of the bridge being tolled or likely to be tolled for seeking name of agencies from DGR This issues aS per approval of Competent Authority: M (M M Zohia) GM (Commercial Operations) Copy submitted to Members/ CGMs/ CVO GMs at HQ PS to the Chairman bridge
